data.route_analysis: Guatemala has well-connected roads, with major routes leading to key cities and natural attractions. Public transport includes buses and shuttles.
data.pricing_trends: Prices for flights tend to rise during the peak tourist season (December to February).
data.seasonal_patterns: The optimal months to visit Guatemala are from November to April, avoiding the rainy season (May to October).
data.booking_windows: The best time to book flights is 3 to 6 months in advance, especially for holiday periods.

destination_insights.route_analysis: Guatemala has well-connected roads, with major routes leading to key cities and natural attractions. Public transport includes buses and shuttles.
destination_insights.seasonal_patterns: The optimal months to visit Guatemala are from November to April, avoiding the rainy season (May to October).
destination_insights.climate: The climate is tropical; expect warm temperatures during the day (20-30°C) and cooler nights, especially in highland areas. Rain is common in the wet season.
destination_insights.culture: Guatemala is rich in Mayan history, with vibrant traditions, colorful festivals, and local markets. Highlights include Semana Santa (Holy Week) and Día de los Muertos (Day of the Dead).
destination_insights.attractions: Key places to visit include Antigua, Lake Atitlan, Tikal National Park, and Semuc Champey.

market_insights.pricing_trends: Prices for flights tend to rise during the peak tourist season (December to February).
market_insights.booking_windows: The best time to book flights is 3 to 6 months in advance, especially for holiday periods.
market_insights.demand: Guatemala remains a growing travel destination, especially for eco and adventure tourism.
market_insights.competition: Alternative destinations include Costa Rica and Belize, offering similar attractions but different travel experiences.

trend_insights.market_trends: There is an increasing trend towards sustainable tourism and local adventure experiences in Guatemala.
trend_insights.consumer_behavior: Travelers prefer immersive experiences that connect them to local communities and environments.
trend_insights.competitive_landscape: Competitors focus on promoting eco-friendly travel packages, adventure tours, and cultural experiences.
trend_insights.seasonal_factors: Travel demand peaks during the dry season, especially around holidays and festivals.
